alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:25PM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EST FOR NORTHERN BALDWIN...SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM AND CENTRAL HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 325 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Allenwood, or near Milledgeville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Sparta, Meriwether, Plant Harlee Branch, Devereux, Beulah, Underwood, Shoulderbone, Oconee Springs Park, Linton and Allenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for central and east central Georgia. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
